headline.main: PAUL MORPHY IN BOSTON.; Speech of Dr. Boines--Mr. Morphy's Response--Poem by James Russell Lowell, &c. BANQUET AT THE REVERE HOUSE.

docs.lead_paragraph: A banquet was given at the Revere House last evening, by the Boston Chess Club, in honor of Mr. PAUL MORPHY. One hundred and forty gentlemen sat at the tables, and among the guests of the evening were Chief Justice SHAW, of the Supreme Court of Massachusetts ;

docs.snippet: COLONEL ANDERSON ARRESTED.--Col. ANDERSON and his friends made their appearance again at the St. Nichols Hotel about 9 o' clock last evening In anticipation of another disturbance, Caption TURNDULL had about half a dozen officers in the barroom of...
docs.lead_paragraph: COLONEL ANDERSON ARRESTED.--Col. ANDERSON and his friends made their appearance again at the St. Nichols Hotel about 9 o' clock last evening In anticipation of another disturbance, Caption TURNDULL had about half a dozen officers in the barroom of the hotel dressed in citizen's apparel.
